name: Re-Cycle (fractalcherries)
description:
Made in 3 hours for Trijam #194: "Recycling is Essential"

Steal bikes for fun and profit! Just ride them up to the recycling center for a quick buck -- no questions asked! Walk over a bike to hop on, then ride over the recycling center logo to get your cash.

Fullscreen recommended. 

Controls when walking: 

  • arrow keys

Controls when biking: 

  • up = accelerate 
  • down = brake
  • l/r = steer

Created by fractalcherries. SFX and music is from Splice.

Notes:  I didn't get the bike-spawning system to work the way I want. It gets easier as time goes on, which isn't the way I wanted to have it balanced. I also wanted more scenery and a minimap, but I ran out of time.
